quotes.quote: A lot of people like snow. I find it to be an unnecessary freezing of water.
quotes.author: Carl Reiner

quotes.quote: In the bleak midwinter Frosty wind made moan, Earth stood hard as iron, Water like a stone; Snow had fallen, snow on snow, Snow on snow, In the bleak midwinter, Long ago.
quotes.author: Christina Rossetti

quotes.quote: The aging process has you firmly in its grasp if you never get the urge to throw a snowball.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: Whose woods these are I think I know. His house is in the village though; He will not see me stopping here To watch his woods fill up with snow.
quotes.author: Robert Frost
